name: youturd - widescreen
description: bugs me till no end that the alignment for the new youturd is so blasphemously OFF. so i realigned it. its not centered because top bar looks like shit centered since they put the elements in the header in SEPERATE CONTAINERS. WHY WHY WHY!? u cray youtube.
additional_info:
youturd.com ftl. adjust according to the width of your screen by zooming in and out brobro.
if you install it with http://userstyles.org/styles/79626/improved-youtube-style you will see magix happen in the form of centered tubes.
